dialogue.introduction: Admiral, thanks for your hard work, Kashima here. Let's do our best again today. I am counting on you.
dialogue.library_intro: Second of the Katori-class training cruisers, the little sister, Kashima. I was built in the time of a peaceful ocean in order to bring up the next generation fleet. The time spent in my original duties wasn't very long, but I gave my very best both as a fleet flagship and escort. After the battle ended, for the sake of the future, I worked very hard! Please remember about Kashima.
dialogue.secretary2: Oh my, the fourth fleet's flagship, is it? I'm wrong? Well now...
dialogue.secretary3: This feeling... that's not big sis Katori, is it...? See! I knew it, Admiral! Fufu.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral? Admiral! Erm... I want to talk about the escort fleet... O-Oh, you look busy... don't you? Sorry, later is fine with me... yes!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral. Someday, when the seas return to peace, I want to go on a long distance cruise with you! I've just got so many places that I want to go to! We'll go for sure, right? For sure? I'm looking forward to it.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral? Is it briefing for a Practice Voyage? Or maybe an Anti-Sub Battle... no, I'm wrong? ...that's... for me? No way, really? ahh... I'll accept it. Thank you so much! I'll treasure it...
dialogue.show_players_score: Oh, do you want to see the numbers? I'll bring them, okay? Ufu.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Fourth fleet's flagship Kashima, is sortieing ! Everyone, let's do our best !
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Uu, I got a little dirty. I'll go take a bath, alright?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm sorry. Kashima, my outfit and this body, I'll clean it up a bit... Wait for me, OK?
dialogue.ship_construction: Admiral, the new ship wants to introduce herself!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Marine escort fleet flagship Kashima, now sortieing!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy? Is it the enemy? We have no choice but to fight. Fleet, make preparations to engage. Please hurry!
dialogue.night_battle: There's no escape! Pursue them. Port and starboard engines, flank speed. I-I can do this!
dialogue.night_attack: Don't underestimate a training cruiser! My equipment and proficiency are more than enough!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Don't underestimate a training cruiser! My equipment and proficiency are more than enough!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Don't underestimate a training cruiser! My equipment and proficiency are more than enough!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Don't underestimate a training cruiser! My equipment and proficiency are more than enough!
dialogue.mvp: Eh, are you kidding - it's me? Kashima has the best battle results? Really? No way, Admiral, I'm a little happy!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Kyaa! I-I won't sink, I have no intention of sinking... here...
dialogue.sunk: No way... it's cold... ah!? It's the ocean waters..? I'm... eh..? I'm sinking..? No...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, today is a special day. Being together with you, make me really happy. Heheh~
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: In the blink of an eye, it's already December, isn't it? The fleet, too, is busy with spring cleaning. I've to work hard as well!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year, Admiral! Take care of Kashima this year as well. I, too, will try my very best.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Katori-nee, it's Setsubun but what's going on...? Ah, we throw (beans) at Admiral-san! I understand! De-mons, out! Ei! Ei! Oh, is that wrong?

hourly.0000: Admiral, on this day, I, Kashima, will be undertaking the position of secretary ship. Fufu, I'm so happy.
hourly.0100: It's 0100, Admiral. Fufufu. How fun♪ ...eh? "What was that", you say? I-It was nothing... ehehe♪
hourly.0200: It's 0200, Admiral. The night sure is long, isn't it. I'll make some tea, okay? Or is coffee better?
hourly.0300: It's 0300, Admiral. You must be getting sleepy, yes? I've got some nicely strong coffee. I'll put it over here, okay? ufufu.
hourly.0400: Admiral, would you like another coffee? This time, how about a great big heaping of milk and sugar? Ah, it's 0400 now!
hourly.0500: It's 0500, Admiral. It's dawn! I'll get breakfast ready later, okay? Japanese, Western... Which would be better this morning?
hourly.0600: It's 0600, Admiral. I've done the "All hands, wake up" for the fleet. Hmm, being on mission duty - it needs the fortitude for all nighters, doesn't it? ufufu
hourly.0700: It's 0700, Admiral. Breakfast is over here, okay? It's scrambled eggs, bacon, toast and hot coffee! Dig in!
hourly.0800: It's 0800, Admiral. Since I think that we'll be busy at lunch, I'll get some sandwiches ready, okay? Ham and egg, then afterwards... fufu.
hourly.0900: Admiral, it's now 0900.　Shall we begin the practices for today? Have you confirmed the status of the expedition before?
hourly.1000: It's 1000. Oh my, that's everyone in the 6th Fleet. They look quite upbeat... Aoba, you're in a mission, so taking photos right now is... eh? Bedhair?! It's can't be, oh no!!
hourly.1100: 1100. Really, that Aoba gave me a shock! Talking about bedhair and what... My hair, it's always... Ah, i-it's nothing...
hourly.1200: It's 1200, Admiral. How about a Kashima Special Sandwich for lunch? Even though you're at work... Ah, there's coffee here, too!
hourly.1300: It's 1300, Admiral.　Did you have one of Kashima's sandwiches? Ah, yes! The largish bits of egg are it's good point, you see. I'm so happy that it suited your tastes~! Ufufu.
hourly.1400: It's 1400, Admiral. Yes, the Marine Escort Fleet? That's right, ASW is so very important. I'll do my best!
hourly.1500: It's 1500. Eh, Admiral Inoue? Yes, while many things have been spoken about him, I, myself respect the man. I think he's an excellent person.
hourly.1600: It's 1600. How nostalgic they were, the days of the South Seas. There were just so many things. The seas of where the Admiral is now... I'll do my very best!
hourly.1700: It's 1700, Admiral. The sunset is lovely, isn't it. I want to watch it forever! I love that final moment when the sun disappears just like that.
hourly.1800: It's 1800, Admiral. Dinner will be a little elaborate, so please look forward to it! Ufufu♪
hourly.1900: It's 1900, Admiral. Please wait just a little more. It's almost done, you see.
hourly.2000: It's 2000, Admiral. I tried making Kashima's special, Chicken Gratin. It's piping hot♪ You can eat it together with this bread. Ufufu♪
hourly.2100: 2100... Oh me, Katori-nee? Good work! Yes, I'm alright! I've worked hard. Right, Admiral? ...Admiral?
hourly.2200: It's true... DesRon3 is really so... active at night, aren't they? They're just so energetic. Ah, they're sortieing. It's 2200 now.
hourly.2300: It's 2300. Admiral, thank you again for you very hard work today as always! Even though I'm not very good at battle... I'll do my best with the flagship duties tomorrow too!
